verses.esv: 12 in whom we have boldness and access with confidence through our faith in him.
verses.kjv: 12 In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him.
verses.niv: 12 In him and through faith in him we may approach God with freedom and confidence.

verses.esv: 6 Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
verses.kjv: 6 Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
verses.niv: 6 Jesus answered, "I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

verses.esv: 16 Let us then with confidence draw near to the throne of grace, that we may receive mercy and find grace to help in time of need.
verses.kjv: 16 Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.
verses.niv: 16 Let us then approach the throne of grace with confidence, so that we may receive mercy and find grace to help us in our time of need.

verses.esv:
4   Blessed is the one you choose and bring near,
    to dwell in your courts!
  We shall be satisfied with the goodness of your house,
    the holiness of your temple!
verses.kjv: 4 Blessed is the man whom thou choosest, and causest to approach unto thee, that he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house, even of thy holy temple.
verses.niv: 4 Blessed are those you choose and bring near to live in your courts! We are filled with the good things of your house, of your holy temple.

verses.esv: 8 Draw near to God, and he will draw near to you. Cleanse your hands, you sinners, and purify your hearts, you double-minded.
verses.kjv: 8 Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.
verses.niv: 8 Come near to God and he will come near to you. Wash your hands, you sinners, and purify your hearts, you double-minded.

verses.esv: 2 Through him we have also obtained access by faith into this grace in which we stand, and we rejoice in hope of the glory of God.
verses.kjv: 2 By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.
verses.niv: 2 through whom we have gained access by faith into this grace in which we now stand. And we rejoice in the hope of the glory of God.

verses.esv: 18 For Christ also suffered once for sins, the righteous for the unrighteous, that he might bring us to God, being put to death in the flesh but made alive in the spirit,
verses.kjv: 18 For Christ also hath once suffered for sins, the just for the unjust, that he might bring us to God, being put to death in the flesh, but quickened by the Spirit:
verses.niv: 18 For Christ died for sins once for all, the righteous for the unrighteous, to bring you to God. He was put to death in the body but made alive by the Spirit,

verses.esv: 19 Therefore, brothers, since we have confidence to enter the holy places by the blood of Jesus, 20 by the new and living way that he opened for us through the curtain, that is, through his flesh, 21 and since we have a great priest over the house of God, 22 let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, with our hearts sprinkled clean from an evil conscience and our bodies washed with pure water.
verses.kjv: 19 Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus, 20 By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh; 21 And having an high priest over the house of God; 22 Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.
verses.niv: 19 Therefore, brothers, since we have confidence to enter the Most Holy Place by the blood of Jesus, 20 by a new and living way opened for us through the curtain, that is, his body, 21 and since we have a great priest over the house of God, 22 let us draw near to God with a sincere heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled to cleanse us from a guilty conscience and having our bodies washed with pure water.

verses.esv: 18 For through him we both have access in one Spirit to the Father.
verses.kjv: 18 For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.
verses.niv: 18 For through him we both have access to the Father by one Spirit.

verses.esv: 19 Therefore, brothers, since we have confidence to enter the holy places by the blood of Jesus,
verses.kjv: 19 Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus,
verses.niv: 19 Therefore, brothers, since we have confidence to enter the Most Holy Place by the blood of Jesus,

verses.esv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
verses.kjv: 6 But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
verses.niv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.

verses.esv: 7 So Jesus again said to them, “Truly, truly, I say to you, I am the door of the sheep.
verses.kjv: 7 Then said Jesus unto them again, Verily, verily, I say unto you, I am the door of the sheep.
verses.niv: 7 Therefore Jesus said again, "I tell you the truth, I am the gate for the sheep.

verses.esv: 13 But now in Christ Jesus you who once were far off have been brought near by the blood of Christ.
verses.kjv: 13 But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.
verses.niv: 13 But now in Christ Jesus you who once were far away have been brought near through the blood of Christ.

verses.esv:
18   The LORD is near to all who call on him,
    to all who call on him in truth.
verses.kjv: 18 The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
verses.niv: 18 The LORD is near to all who call on him, to all who call on him in truth.

verses.esv: 6 do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 6 Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 6 Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv:
11   You make known to me the path of life;
    in your presence there is fullness of joy;
    at your right hand are pleasures forevermore.
verses.kjv: 11 Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
verses.niv: 11 You have made known to me the path of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence, with eternal pleasures at your right hand.

verses.esv:
3   Send out your light and your truth;
    let them lead me;
  let them bring me to your holy hill
    and to your dwelling!
verses.kjv: 3 O send out thy light and thy truth: let them lead me; let them bring me unto thy holy hill, and to thy tabernacles.
verses.niv: 3 Send forth your light and your truth, let them guide me; let them bring me to your holy mountain, to the place where you dwell.

verses.esv: 6 But when you pray, go into your room and shut the door and pray to your Father who is in secret. And your Father who sees in secret will reward you.
verses.kjv: 6 But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.
verses.niv: 6 But when you pray, go into your room, close the door and pray to your Father, who is unseen. Then your Father, who sees what is done in secret, will reward you.

verses.esv:
6   For there shall be a day when watchmen will call
    in the hill country of Ephraim:
  ‘Arise, and let us go up to Zion,
    to the LORD our God.’”
verses.kjv: 6 For there shall be a day, that the watchmen upon the mount Ephraim shall cry, Arise ye, and let us go up to Zion unto the LORD our God.
verses.niv: 6 There will be a day when watchmen cry out on the hills of Ephraim, 'Come, let us go up to Zion, to the LORD our God.'"

verses.esv: 51 Behold! I tell you a mystery. We shall not all sleep, but we shall all be changed,
verses.kjv: 51 Behold, I shew you a mystery; We shall not all sleep, but we shall all be changed,
verses.niv: 51 Listen, I tell you a mystery: We will not all sleep, but we will all be changed--

verses.esv:
28   But for me it is good to be near God;
    I have made the Lord GOD my refuge,
    that I may tell of all your works.
verses.kjv: 28 But it is good for me to draw near to God: I have put my trust in the Lord GOD, that I may declare all thy works.
verses.niv: 28 But as for me, it is good to be near God. I have made the Sovereign LORD my refuge; I will tell of all your deeds.

verses.esv: 19 (for the law made nothing perfect); but on the other hand, a better hope is introduced, through which we draw near to God.
verses.kjv: 19 For the law made nothing perfect, but the bringing in of a better hope did; by the which we draw nigh unto God.
verses.niv: 19 (for the law made nothing perfect), and a better hope is introduced, by which we draw near to God.

verses.esv:
3     and many peoples shall come, and say:
  “Come, let us go up to the mountain of the LORD,
    to the house of the God of Jacob,
  that he may teach us his ways
    and that we may walk in his paths.”
  For out of Zion shall go forth the law,
    and the word of the LORD from Jerusalem.
verses.kjv: 3 And many people shall go and say, Come ye, and let us go up to the mountain of the LORD, to the house of the God of Jacob; and he will teach us of his ways, and we will walk in his paths: for out of Zion shall go forth the law, and the word of the LORD from Jerusalem.
verses.niv: 3 Many peoples will come and say, "Come, let us go up to the mountain of the LORD, to the house of the God of Jacob. He will teach us his ways, so that we may walk in his paths." The law will go out from Zion, the word of the LORD from Jerusalem.

verses.esv:
4   One thing have I asked of the LORD,
    that will I seek after:
  that I may dwell in the house of the LORD
    all the days of my life,
  to gaze upon the beauty of the LORD
    and to inquire in his temple.
verses.kjv: 4 One thing have I desired of the LORD, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the LORD all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the LORD, and to enquire in his temple.
verses.niv: 4 One thing I ask of the LORD, this is what I seek: that I may dwell in the house of the LORD all the days of my life, to gaze upon the beauty of the LORD and to seek him in his temple.

verses.esv:
A Psalm of David.

15:1   O LORD, who shall sojourn in your tent?
    Who shall dwell on your holy hill?
verses.kjv: 1 LORD, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? who shall dwell in thy holy hill?
verses.niv: 1 LORD, who may dwell in your sanctuary? Who may live on your holy hill?
